Comment: I wish my uni pres had signed it. Unlike the schools with signatories, we currently have no protections for free speech or to do the research we are trained to do. Students, citizens or not, have no protection from ICE. We are being told that Trump will decide what we are allowed to teach and research. So, that statement actually means something. It’s not everything, but it’s saying the Constitution matters.
Author: TuffyButters
